TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Annotation extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement
Public MustInherit Class Annotation Inherits ChartNamedElement

summary.span: 定義所有註釋通用的屬性和方法。

span.span: Defines properties and methods common to all annotations.

summary.span: 這是 abstract 類別。

span.span: This is an abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註解通常使用於註解或對等資料點的圖表項目的說明。Annotations are commonly used to comment or elaborate on chart elements such as data points. 註釋也可用以繪製自訂圖案。Annotations can also be used to draw custom shapes. 根據預設，註釋位於使用相對座標，(0，0) 代表左上角中，與 (100,100) 表示圖表影像的右下角。By default, annotations are positioned using relative coordinates, with (0,0) representing the top-left corner, and (100,100) representing the bottom-right corner of the chart image. 它也可從這個相對座標系統切換到使用軸值的系統。It is also possible to switch from this relative coordinate system to a system that uses axis values. 與軸座標系統、 X 和 Y 代表註解的左上角的位置，都使用設定 X 軸和 Y 軸值，而不是介於 0 到 100 之間的值。With an axis coordinate system, X and Y, which represent the position of the top-left corner of an annotation, are set using X axis and Y axis values, instead of values that range from 0-100. 有兩種方式使用軸值，當您指定的位置和大小的註解：There are two ways to use axis values when you specify the position and size of an annotation: - 設定，或多個這些附註屬性，以和屬性值物件。Set the , or both of these annotation properties to the and property values of a object. - 使用錨定至資料點的註解的屬性。Use the property to anchor the annotation to a data point. 在此情況下，會自動計算的位置。In this case, its positioning is automatically calculated. 所有註解衍生自類別，可用來設定所有的通用屬性定位錨定的物件，例如色彩等等。All annotations are derived from the class, which can be used to set attributes common to all objects, such as color, position, anchoring and so forth.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

summary.span: 這是預設的建構函式，而且不應該使用。

span.span: This is the default constructor and should not be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註釋是抽象類別，且不能直接建立。Annotation is an abstract class and cannot be created directly. 若要建立新的註解物件，請使用類別建構函式例如， ，等等。To create a new annotation object, use constructors of classes such as , , and the like.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須使用錨定註解屬性，或藉由設定和屬性。The annotation must be anchored by either using the property, or by setting the and properties. 其和屬性必須設為。Its and properties must be set to .

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.AnchorPointUITypeEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定註釋錨定的資料點。

span.span: Gets or sets the data point to which an annotation is anchored.

value.span: 註釋錨定的 物件。

span.span: A object to which an annotation is anchored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 附註錨定至指定的資料點的 X 和 Y 值，並會自動為資料點使用相同的軸座標。The annotation is anchored to the X and Y values of the specified data point, and automatically uses the same axes coordinates as the data point. 若要自動放置在相對於錨點的註解，請確定其和屬性會設為。To automatically position the annotation relative to the anchor point, make sure its and properties are set to . 屬性可用來變更自動位置的對齊方式註解錨點。The property can be used to change the automatic position alignment of the annotation to the anchor point. 和屬性可能用來新增額外間距。The and properties may be used to add extra spacing. 當您使用這個屬性時，請確定和屬性設定為 Double.NaN，因為它們已優先順序。When you use this property, make sure the and properties are set to Double.NaN, as they have precedence. 將此值設定為`null`停用到的資料點錨定註解。Set this value to `null` to disable annotation anchoring to a data point.

summary.span: 取得或設定註釋錨定的 X 座標。

span.span: Gets or sets the X coordinate to which the annotation is anchored.

value.span: 值，表示註解錨定的 X 座標。

span.span: A value that represents the X coordinate an annotation is anchored to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 附註錨定至 X 座標和相對圖表中所指定或軸座標，取決於屬性值。The annotation is anchored to the X coordinate and is specified in relative chart or axes coordinates, depending on the property value. 若要自動放置在相對於錨點的註解，請確定其屬性設定為。To automatically position an annotation relative to an anchor point, make sure its property is set to . 屬性可用來變更自動位置的對齊方式註解錨點。The property can be used to change the automatic position alignment of the annotation to the anchor point. 和屬性可能用來新增額外間距。The and properties may be used to add extra spacing. 這個屬性的優先順序高於屬性。This property has a higher priority than the property. 將此值設定為停用註解錨定的值。Set this value to to disable annotation anchoring to the value.

summary.span: 取得或設定註釋所連接的 X 軸。

span.span: Gets or sets the X axis to which an annotation is attached.

value.span: 註釋所連接的 物件。

span.span: An object to which the annotation is attached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果註解附加到座標軸，它的 X 位置一律會指定的軸座標。When an annotation is attached to an axis, its X position is always specified in axes coordinates. 同時定義軸座標中的註解的大小，請確定屬性設定為`false`。To also define the size of an annotation in axes coordinates, make sure the property is set to `false`. 將此值設定為`null`停用附件的座標軸。Set this value to `null` to disable attachment to the axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 次要色彩用於時或用。The secondary color is used with the when or is used. 這個屬性不適用於線條類型註釋、 影像註釋和文字註解。This property does not apply to line-type annotations, image annotations and text annotations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定圖表區域名稱，註解只繪製指定的圖表區域的繪圖區域內。If the chart area name is specified, an annotation will only be drawn inside the plotting area of the chart area specified. 將裁剪的註解在繪圖區之外的所有部分。All parts of the annotation outside of the plotting area will be clipped. 若要停用圖表區域依附，請將屬性設定為。To disable chart area clipping, set the property to .

summary.span: 結束讓使用者放置註解。

span.span: Ends the end user placement of an annotation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會結束先前啟動的註解定位作業方法呼叫。This method ends an annotation placement operation previously started by a method call. 呼叫這個方法不需要，因為使用者輸入所需的所有點時，就會自動結束位置。Calling this method is not required, because placement will automatically end when an end user enters all required points. 不過，它時，註解位置需要中止，因為某些原因。However, it is useful when an annotation placement operation needs to be aborted for some reason.

summary.span: 取得或設定註釋的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of an annotation.

value.span: 值，表示註釋的高度。

span.span: A value that represents the height of an annotation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註解的高度可以是的負值，切換案例的註解方向時。The height of an annotation can be a negative value, in which case the annotation orientation is switched. 以相對圖表座標或軸座標中，可以是註解的寬度。Annotation width can be in relative chart coordinates or in axes coordinates. 預設會使用圖表相對座標表示。Chart relative coordinates are used by default. 若要使用軸座標，附註錨定來使用資料點屬性或設定註解座標軸會使用或屬性和設定屬性`false`。To use axes coordinates, anchor an annotation to a data point using the property, or set the annotation axes using the or properties and set the property to `false`. 將寬度設定為可達成註解文字的自動大小計算。Set the width to to achieve automatic size calculation for annotations with text. 大小會自動會根據計算註解文字和字型的大小。The size will automatically be calculated based on the annotation text and font size.

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the size of an annotation is always defined in relative chart coordinates.

value.span: 如果註釋的 與 一定會以相對圖表座標表示，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the and of an annotation are always expressed in relative chart coordinates; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在相對的圖表或軸座標，可能設定的高度和寬度的註解。The height and width of an annotation may be set in relative chart or in axes coordinates. 相對圖表座標是預設值。Relative chart coordinates are the default. 若要表示軸座標中的註解的大小，設定屬性`false`。To express the size of an annotation in axes coordinates, set the property to `false`. 然後錨定至資料點的註解或設定和屬性。Then anchor the annotation to a data point or set the and properties.
